metadata.title: About Murphy Ben International | Bridging African Content
metadata.description: Learn about MBI's journey from a media startup to a global content aggregator. We bridge the gap between African creativity and the world.

hero.heading: We Are the Bridge
hero.subheading: Connecting African creativity to the global digital economy through technology, distribution, and community.

mission.heading: Our Mission
mission.body: To empower African storytellers by providing the digital infrastructure, protection, and distribution networks needed to monetize their craft on a global scale. We believe that African content deserves a world-class stage.

story.heading: Our Journey
paragraphs: Murphy Ben International (MBI) began with a singular vision: to solve the fragmentation of the African entertainment market. Founded by Murphy Ben, the company identified early on that while African content—specifically Nollywood—was in high demand, the distribution channels were broken.

In 2013, we launched Aforevo, initially as a YouTube-first strategy to capture the diaspora audience. By leveraging data analytics and direct licensing, we grew Aforevo into one of the continent's largest Multi-Channel Networks (MCNs).

Today, MBI has evolved into a 360-degree digital powerhouse. From our dubbing studios in Lagos translating content into French, Swahili, and Lingala, to our tech division building anti-piracy tools, we are no longer just distributing content; we are defining the ecosystem.
